Class FinanceStatsSinglePeriod

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class FinanceStatsSinglePeriod
extends FinanceStats
    Takes care of the calculations for finance statistics for a single period.

    Rinke

    • Method Detail

      • getTableCellsExpenditureSinglePeriod

        public java.lang.Number[][] getTableCellsExpenditureSinglePeriod(NamedPeriod aPeriod,
                                                        java.util.Collection<PaymentFilter> aPaymentFilters,
                                                        SystemAccountType aSystemAccountFilter)
        gives the resulting table data for expenditure single period. It first checks if the period, paymentFilters and systemAccountType are the same, and if so, it will return a possibly already available result, rather than calculating it anew. TransferTypes
        Returns:
        a Number[][] containing the table data for overview single period.

      • getTableCellsIncomeSinglePeriod

        public java.lang.Number[][] getTableCellsIncomeSinglePeriod(NamedPeriod aPeriod,
                                                   java.util.Collection<PaymentFilter> aPaymentFilters,
                                                   SystemAccountType aSystemAccountFilter)
        gives the resulting table data for income single period. It first checks if the period, paymentFilters and systemAccountType are the same, and if so, it will return a possibly already available result, rather than calculating it anew.
        Parameters:
        aPeriod -
        aPaymentFilters - a collection of paymentFilters. If only one paymentFilter is selected, this filter will be split up into its containing TransferTypes
        aSystemAccountFilter -
        Returns:
        a Number[][] containing the table data for overview single period.

      • getTableCellsOverviewSinglePeriod

        public java.lang.Number[][] getTableCellsOverviewSinglePeriod(Period aPeriod,
                                                     java.util.Collection<PaymentFilter> aPaymentFilters,
                                                     SystemAccountType aSystemAccountFilter)
        gives the resulting table data for overview single period. It first checks if the period, paymentFilters and systemAccountType are the same, and if so, it will return a possibly already available result, rather than calculating it anew.
        Parameters:
        aPeriod -
        aPaymentFilters - a collection of paymentFilters. If only one paymentFilter is selected, this filter will be split up into its containing TransferTypes
        aSystemAccountFilter -
        Returns:
        a Number[][] containing the table data for overview single period.
